entries.loam1: A prisoner has escaped.  Go to the cantina in Moenia and speak to the locals.  Find out who helped the prisoner escape.
entries.thug1_reply1: I am looking for an escaped prisoner.  Tell me where he is or else!
entries.thug2: Well how should I know where he is?  I bet that rebel camp outside town had something to do with his escape.
entries.thug3_reply1: Maybe you shouldn't drink so much of that stuff.
